subject: CSS
question:
The justify content property has a similar effect on the flex items, but the difference is that it aligns the flex items along the main axis. Please list and describe the posible values for justify-content:

1.
2.
3.
4.
5.
answer:
1. center : Centers all flex items along the main axis.
2. flex-start : Aligns all flex items at the start of the main axis.
3. flex-end : Aligns all flex items at the end of the main axis.
4. space-around : Distributes all the items evenly along the main axis, with a bit of space left at either end.
5. space-between : Very similar to space-around except that it doesn't leave any space at either end.
